decks.notes: This deck focuses on utilizing powerful control spells like Thoughtseize and Go Blank to disrupt the opponent's hand and board presence, while generating value through cards like Waste Not and Hostile Investigator. The deck also utilizes removal spells such as Fatal Push and Sheoldred's Edict to deal with threats efficiently. The inclusion of planeswalkers like Liliana of the Veil and powerful creatures like Sheoldred, the Apocalypse allows for multiple win conditions and a versatile game plan. The deck aims to grind out the opponent through resource denial and incremental advantage.

This Gruul Aggro deck focuses on playing aggressive creatures and burn spells to quickly overwhelm the opponent. With cards like Monastery Swiftspear, Soul-Scar Mage, and Questing Druid, this deck aims to deal damage quickly and efficiently. The inclusion of cards like Blossoming Defense and Rampaging Ferocidon helps to protect your creatures and punish the opponent's life gain strategies. Utilizing Jegantha, the Wellspring as a companion adds consistency to the deck and provides additional value. Overall, this deck is all about being fast, aggressive, and punishing the opponent.

This deck focuses on utilizing green devotion and aggro strategies to overwhelm opponents. By ramping up with mana dorks and enchantments like Wolfwillow Haven, it aims to cast powerful green creatures like Old-Growth Troll and Cavalier of Thorns early on. Cards like Storm the Festival and Kiora, Behemoth Beckoner help to maintain card advantage and keep the pressure on the opponent. The inclusion of Boseiju, Who Endures and Ulvenwald Oddity provides additional utility and threats to further increase the deck's effectiveness in one-on-one matches.

The main strategy of this deck is to control the opponent's resources through hand disruption with cards like Thoughtseize and Duress, as well as removal spells like Fatal Push and Go for the Throat. The deck also aims to generate value with cards like Liliana of the Veil and Waste Not, while utilizing additional win conditions such as Sheoldred, the Apocalypse and Reckoner Bankbuster. The inclusion of a strong land base with utility lands like Castle Locthwain and Field of Ruin further enhances the deck's control capabilities, making it a formidable Mono Black Control archetype in Pioneer 1 vs 1 format.

This deck focuses on using Niv-Mizzet Reborn as a powerful control card to draw a plethora of different colored spells. By utilizing the diversity of spells available in the deck, the player can control the board state and disrupt their opponent's strategies effectively. The inclusion of Bring to Light allows for flexibility in fetching crucial spells from the deck, while the companion Yorion, Sky Nomad provides additional value and longevity in longer games. Overall, the key concept of this deck is to out-value and out-control the opponent through a varied spell selection.

This deck focuses on controlling the board using Fires of Invention to cast powerful spells for free. Enigmatic Incarnation is used to tutor for specific creatures, while Leyline Binding and Brushland help to control the opponent's resources. Yorion, Sky Nomad serves as a companion for extra value and card advantage. The deck includes a variety of creatures with powerful effects such as Agent of Treachery and Atraxa, Grand Unifier. The mana base is diverse to ensure consistent access to all colors needed for the deck's strategy.
